MapOperation.description: Tools of interaction with map, function for this section is below

features.name: Zoom In - Zoom Out
features.description: Allows users to zoom in on the map to view details more closely or zoom out on the map for a broader perspective. (User can use scroll button on mouse for Zoom-In and Zoom-Out.)

features.name: Capture Map
features.description: Captures and saves the current map view as an image, focusing only on map and objects (not including side panel and feature button).

features.name: Map Types
features.description: Allows users to switch between different map types: Google, Terrain, Hybrid, Yandex, UMP. (Map provided is offline for system security.)

features.name: Map Dark/Light Mode
features.description: Toggles the map display between dark and light modes for better visibility.

features.name: Unit of Pinned Location
features.description: Allows users to change the unit of measurement for coordinates of pinned locations.

features.name: Save Areas and Symbols
features.description: Saves the current areas and symbols for future use.

features.name: Load Areas and Symbols
features.description: Loads the saved areas and symbols onto the map.

features.name: Clear Areas and Symbols
features.description: Clears all areas and symbols currently displayed on the map.

SystemSettings.description: General settings of the system with multiple sections

features.name: Display Unit
features.description: Adjusts the speed line representation for aircraft, either head or tail.

features.name: Measurement Unit
features.description: Configures units for position, altitude, speed, and bearing.

features.name: Quick Measurement Setting
features.description: A quick setup option to match system settings.

features.name: Max Speed for Collision Point Calculation
features.description: Sets the maximum speed for aircraft when calculating collision points.

features.name: Radar Radius Setting
features.description: Manages four radar radius circles, allowing individual toggling on or off.

features.name: Send-Receive Port Data
features.description: Configures serial port data transmission, with settings for port, bps, data bits, parity, stop bits, and flow control.

MapSettings.description: Settings for radar position and range on the map

features.name: Radar Position
features.description: Sets the radar's central position on the map.

features.name: Radar
features.description: Defines radar parameters for coverage and range display on the map.

AreaManagement.description: Defines, modifies, or removes areas by pinning at least three points

features.name: Create Area
features.description: Creates a new area on the map.

features.name: Edit Area
features.description: Edits an existing area on the map.

features.name: Delete Area
features.description: Deletes an area from the map.

SymbolsManagement.description: Manages military symbols on the map

features.name: Create Symbol
features.description: Creates a new symbol on the map.

features.name: Edit Symbol
features.description: Edits an existing symbol on the map.

features.name: Delete Symbols
features.description: Deletes symbols from the map.

FakingSystem.description: Aircraft simulation system where users input required information before adding simulated aircraft

features.name: Add Faker Aircraft
features.description: Inserts a simulated aircraft onto the map, requiring complete data input.

features.name: Faker Information
features.description: Displays detailed information on simulated aircraft.

features.name: Edit Faker Status
features.description: Modifies the status of simulated aircraft.

features.name: Delete Faker Aircraft
features.description: Removes simulated aircraft from the map.

MeasurementTools.description: Tools for measuring distance and calculating potential collisions between aircraft

features.name: Calculation Collision
features.description: Calculates potential collision points between two selected aircraft. (Select first aircraft -> Select second aircraft, then wait for system calculation.)

features.name: Measure Distance
features.description: Measures distances between various points, including aircraft and ground locations. (Can measure only between two items, such as Aircraft-Aircraft, Aircraft-Symbol, Symbol-Symbol, etc.)

AircraftMonitoring.description: System for monitoring aircraft on the map

features.name: Select Aircraft
features.description: Allows users to select specific aircraft on the map for closer inspection. (User can press and hold 'F' button on keyboard then Left-click desired track.)

features.name: Aircraft Information
features.description: Displays detailed information about selected aircraft, including Track ID, IFF, position, speed, direction, altitude, and status. Simulated tracks allow status modification and track deletion.
